info.title: Vegi Backend
info.description: This is a generated swagger json for the Vegi backend API.

tags.name: Peepl pay Update Paid Order webhook

vendor.description: JSON dictionary representing the **vendor** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

deliveryPartner.description: JSON dictionary representing the **deliverypartner** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

user.description: JSON dictionary representing the **user** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

name.description: The name of the cross vendor category group.

imageUrl.description: The URL of the cross vendor category group image.

forRestaurantItem.description: Group of products only contains restaurant prepared items (takeaway, order-in and delivery)

name.description: The name of the Delivery Partner.

email.description: The email of the Delivery Partner.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the Delivery Partner.

description.description: A brief description of the delivery partner.

walletAddress.description: The blockchain wallet address for the delivery partner. Used to distribute payments from vendors.

imageUrl.description: A description of where the featured image file can be found

deliveryFulfilmentMethod.description: JSON dictionary representing the **fulfilmentmethod** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

users.description: Array of **user**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

value.description: The amount to discount; between 0 and 100 if percentage.

vendor.description: Optional vendor for this discount JSON dictionary representing the **vendor** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

orders.description: all orders that the discount has been applied to Array of **order**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

title.description: The headline for the explanatory reason that contributes to the products aggregated esc measure

escrating.description: JSON dictionary representing the **escrating** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

escsource.description: JSON dictionary representing the **escsource** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

productPublicId.description: The public id of the product

calculatedOn.description: The beginning of the estimated fulfilment slot.

product.description: JSON dictionary representing the **product** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

name.description: The name of the delivery method.

description.description: A brief description of the shipping method.

priceModifier.description: A positive or negative integer representing the amount of pence to adjust the base price by.

bufferLength.description: The required buffer time before booking a slot.

orderCutoff.description: The time after which no new bookings can be made.

maxOrders.description: The maximum number of orders allowed per slot.

maxDeliveryDistance.description: Max Distance (by road) in KILOMETERS that a FulfilmentMethod will fulfill

vendor.description: JSON dictionary representing the **vendor** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

deliveryPartner.description: JSON dictionary representing the **deliverypartner** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

openingHours.description: Array of **openinghours**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

fulfilmentOrigin.description: Origin Address for deliveries that can be used by vendors to determine delivery distances, particularly if delivery not from store address. JSON dictionary representing the **address** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

headers.description: the headers information from the request

guid.description: An optional guid to be supplied if you wanted to identify an individual like to the original creator who could store the guid that they used to create the like.

recipient.description: The number, email or firebase topicid of the recipient

type.description: The URL of the vendor category image.

sentAt.description: The unixtime when the notification was sent.

order.description: the linked order if there was an order linked to this notification (nullable) JSON dictionary representing the **order** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

specialDate.description: Specific date override - for example Christmas day

fulfilmentMethod.description: JSON dictionary representing the **fulfilmentmethod** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

orderedDateTime.description: The unixtime when the order was placed.

paidDateTime.description: The unixtime when the order payment was paid (if at all).

refundDateTime.description: The unixtime when the order payment was refunded (if at all).

deliveryPhoneNumber.description: The phone number for the delivery.

deliveryAddressLineOne.description: The first line of the delivery address.

deliveryAddressLineTwo.description: The second line of the delivery address.

deliveryAddressCity.description: The city of the delivery address.

deliveryAddressPostCode.description: The post code of the delivery address.

deliveryAddressInstructions.description: Details about how/where to deliver the order.

customerWalletAddress.description: The wallet address of the customer.

firebaseRegistrationToken.description: Used to send notificaitons to devices that are registered to this order

deliveryId.description: The ID to identify the delivery in the logistics system

fulfilmentSlotFrom.description: The beginning of the estimated fulfilment slot.

fulfilmentSlotTo.description: The end of the estimated fulfilment slot.

fulfilmentMethod.description: JSON dictionary representing the **fulfilmentmethod** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

discounts.description: all discouns that have been applied to this order Array of **discount**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

items.description: Array of **orderitem**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

unfulfilledItems.description: Array of **orderitem**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

vendor.description: JSON dictionary representing the **vendor** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

deliveryPartner.description: JSON dictionary representing the **deliverypartner** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

parentOrder.description: JSON dictionary representing the **order** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

unfulfilled.description: flag to show that item was unfulfilled from an order

unfulfilledOnOrderId.description: Used to track the original order internal id of the parent order when an item is flagged as unfulfilled on an order, it is not removed from the order, it is just flagged as unfulfilled for tracking purposes.

order.description: The order to which the item belongs JSON dictionary representing the **order** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

product.description: The product which has been ordered. JSON dictionary representing the **product** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

optionValues.description: Array of **orderitemoptionvalue**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

option.description: JSON dictionary representing the **productoption** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

optionValue.description: JSON dictionary representing the **productoptionvalue** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

orderItem.description: JSON dictionary representing the **orderitem** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

outcode.description: The outcode for any post codes within this district.

vendors.description: Array of **vendor**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

basePrice.description: Base product price in pence. This can be modified by product options or delivery methods.

isAvailable.description: Boolean to represent whether the product is available or not.

priority.description: Temporary way to store priority of products

isFeatured.description: Boolean to represent whether the product is featured or not.

status.description: string active|inactive to represent whether product is discontinued or not

vendorInternalId.description: The Internal ID from the vendor

stockCount.description: The remaining stock count for this product SKU

supplier.description: The name of the supplier i.e. Suma

brandName.description: The name of the brand i.e. Jelly Bears

taxGroup.description: An optional tax grouping such as STD VAT

stockUnitsPerProduct.description: Number of units per pack, i.e. a pack of 6 would have value of 6

sizeInnerUnitValue.description: i.e. 450 if 1 inner unit in the package is 450ml

sizeInnerUnitType.description: A measure of the units used to describe the value of the size of 1 unit i.e. ml

productBarCode.description: A stringified long number, potentially GUID in future, that maps to the UPC (barcode) on the product

vendor.description: The seller of the product. JSON dictionary representing the **vendor** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

options.description: A collection of options that apply to the product (i.e. colour). Array of **productoption**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

category.description: The category of the product. JSON dictionary representing the **productcategory** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

proxyForVegiProduct.description: A proxy product used to provide ratings for a vegi product from a similar product not on vegi. This field is Foreign Keyed to product.id in the DB JSON dictionary representing the **product** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

name.description: The name of the product category.

imageUrl.description: The URL of the product category image.

vendor.description: The category owner. JSON dictionary representing the **vendor** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

categoryGroup.description: The category group shared between vendors. JSON dictionary representing the **categorygroup** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

products.description: Array of **product**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

name.description: Name of the product options, for example "colour".

isRequired.description: Whether or not this option is required.

product.description: The product for which the option applies. JSON dictionary representing the **product** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

values.description: The values that can be chosen for this option (i.e. blue, green) Array of **productoptionvalue**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

name.description: The name of the option value (e.g. Blue)

description.description: The description of the option value (e.g. This is a great sky blue shade!)

priceModifier.description: The amount of pence to add or subtract from the product total for this option.

isAvailable.description: Represents whether or not the option value is available.

option.description: The option to which this value can apply. JSON dictionary representing the **productoption** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

name.description: The name of the option value (e.g. Blue)

qrCode.description: A stringified long number, potentially GUID in future, that maps to the UPC (barcode) on the product

imageUrls.description: Array of **productsuggestionimage**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

productSuggestion.description: The productsuggestion to which this image applies. JSON dictionary representing the **productsuggestion** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

paymentIntentId.description: The paymentIntentId of the ORIGINAL payment

currency.description: The UPPERCASE asset or numeraire used in the trade to buy the order items from the seller

requestedAt.description: The unixtime when the refund was requested.

order.description: the linked order if there was an order linked to this notification (nullable) JSON dictionary representing the **order** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

discount.description: JSON dictionary representing the **discount** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

order.description: JSON dictionary representing the **order** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

secret.description: Securely hashed representation of the service account's secret.

imageUrl.description: A description of where the featured image file can be found

platformFee.description: The platform fee (in pence) that is charged for this vendor.

products.description: Array of **product**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

name.description: The name of the vendor category (i.e. a cafe).

imageUrl.description: The URL of the vendor category image.

vendors.description: Array of **vendor**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

personInFront.description: the id of the person in front in the queue

AttributeFilterParam.description: To filter results based on a particular attribute, specify a query parameter with the same name as the attribute defined on your model. For instance, if our `Purchase` model has an `amount` attribute, we could send `GET /purchase?amount=99.99` to return a list of $99.99 purchases.

WhereQueryParam.name: where
WhereQueryParam.description:
Instead of filtering based on a specific attribute, you may instead choose to provide a `where` parameter with the WHERE piece of a [Waterline criteria](https://sailsjs.com/documentation/concepts/models-and-orm/query-language), _encoded as a JSON string_. This allows you to take advantage of `contains`, `startsWith`, and other sub-attribute criteria modifiers for more powerful `find()` queries.

e.g. `?where={"name":{"contains":"theodore"}}`

LimitQueryParam.name: limit
LimitQueryParam.description: The maximum number of records to send back (useful for pagination). Defaults to 30.

SkipQueryParam.name: skip
SkipQueryParam.description: The number of records to skip (useful for pagination).

SortQueryParam.name: sort
SortQueryParam.description:
The sort order. By default, returned records are sorted by primary key value in ascending order.

e.g. `?sort=lastName%20ASC`
